name: Somniphobia (itch) (ThisIsNotGreen)
description:
Somniphobia - You're not alone in your nightmares

Somniphobia is a game about killing the demons in your nightmares

PLAY THE GAME IN FULL SCREEN AND DON'T CLICK "QUIT" WHEN PLAYING IN WEB

MADE BY THISISNOTGREEN: twitter.com/ThisIsNotGreen 
CARRD:  thisisnotgreen.carrd.co

WASD - move

LEFT SHIFT/RIGHT CLICK - dash

LEFT CLICK - shoot

CURSOR - aim

ESC - pause
